mapper.select: select r.recruit_id, r.content, p.party_id, p.name, p.miracle_start_time, p.miracle_end_time, p.activity, p.max_member_count, (select count(*) from party_member as pm where pm.party_id = p.party_id) as member_count from recruit as r join party as p on r.party_id = p.party_id;

select r.recruit_id, r.content, p.party_id, p.name, p.miracle_start_time, p.miracle_end_time, p.activity, p.max_member_count, (select count(*) from party_member as pm where pm.party_id = p.party_id) as member_count from recruit as r join party as p on r.party_id = p.party_id where r.recruit_id = #{recruitId};
